title: 1991년 Banford 사건
summary: 미국 Oregon, OR 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Banford. 판결일: 1991-08-28. 법원: Court of Appeals of Oregon.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE OF OREGON v. LYLE D. BANFORD
**판결일**: 1991-08-28
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Oregon
**관할**: Oregon, OR

**판사**: Deits, Richardson, Warren

## 변호인

Sally L. Avera, Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause and filed the brief for appellant., Timothy Sylwester, Assistant Attorney General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. On the brief were Dave Frohnmayer, Attorney General, Virginia L. Linder, Solicitor General, Janet A. Klapstein, Assistant Attorney General, and Marianne Ghim, Certified Law Student, Salem.

## 인용

- 108 Or. App. 570
- 815 P.2d 718

## 판결문 요약


PER CURIAM
Defendant was convicted of rape. ORS 163.375. The trial court sentenced him to ten years imprisonment and ordered several conditions of parole. The state acknowledges that the court could recommend conditions of parole but concedes that it lacked authority to impose the conditions. See State v. Edwards, 103 Or App 410, 797 P2d 402 (1990).
Conviction affirmed; conditions of parole vacated; remanded for resentencing.
...
